{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the symptoms described, the patient has an infectious process associated with the maxillary right lateral incisor. The symptoms include a high temperature, swelling on the right side of the face, inability to open the right eye, and soft, painful tissue that rebounds when palpated. These symptoms indicate the presence of an abscess. The appropriate treatment for an abscess is incision and drainage to remove the pus and alleviate the infection. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Incision and Drainage.", "answer_choice": "C"}
